channel.title: AShen War Paint
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "AShen War Paint" - When does it's effect dissapear?

item.title: Re: AShen War Paint
item.content:encoded: It's like the reversing hourglass effect. It lasts until you use it (or it gets used in the case of Reversing Hourglass). I've found nothing that cancels it's effect prematurely.

item.title: AShen War Paint
item.content:encoded: I used an Ashen War Paint last season and the "+10 Range" bonus hasn't dissapeared yet, is it permament or should I bug report it so it'll get taken off?
